title: Why does Pixel 4a send multiple SMS and sometimes receives duplicates?
content:
Hi i recently bought pixel 4a using polish carrier (4g). whenever i send an SMS the receiving party gets 4 messages instead of 1. The same happens when I receive SMS - randomly I get duplicates. Chat option is OFF (RCS off?). When I enable Chat it works fine.

None of the threads I found here have a working solution although they are closed

Thanks
